sys_ux_client_script.name: Update Account and Contact State

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_26179b80479a3110036bbce5536d43b6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Create default">17a5db00479a3110036bbce5536d43f5</macroponent><name>Update Account and Contact State</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var defaultValue = {'id':'-1','label':''};
    var account = defaultValue;
    var contact = defaultValue;
    let orderNumber = '';
    
    if(api.data.get_order_db.results != undefined && api.data.get_order_db.results.length > 0){
       account = {
        'id':api.data.get_order_db.results[0].account.value,
        'label':api.data.get_order_db.results[0].account.displayValue
		  };
       contact = {
        'id':api.data.get_order_db.results[0].contact.value,
        'label':api.data.get_order_db.results[0].contact.displayValue
		  };
          
        //Retrieve Order Number
        orderNumber = api.data.get_order_db.results[0].number.value;
    }
    api.setState('account',account);
    api.setState('contact',contact); 
    api.setState('orderNumber',orderNumber);
   
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-30 20:25:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>26179b80479a3110036bbce5536d43b6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Account and Contact State</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_26179b80479a3110036bbce5536d43b6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-31 16:11:57</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
